snippet.title: Batman: Arkham Knight - 1970s Batmobile & Cauldron Speedway TT
snippet.description:
Batman: Arkham Knight - 1970s Batman Themed Batmobile Skin & "Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #3" (AR Challenges) gameplay in Full HD (1080p)

Batmobile Race: Cauldron Speedway TT
Vehicle: 1970s Batman Themed Batmobile Skin

===================================

Game available on: Sony PlayStation 4, Microsoft Xbox One & PC
Video recorded on: Sony PS4

===================================

Follow BatmanArkhamVideos on:
● YouTube - http://www.youtube.com/BatmanArkhamVideos
● Twitter- http://www.twitter.com/ArkhamVideos
● Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/BatmanArkhamNews

For more info and videos, visit http://www.Batman-Arkham.com and http://www.Games-Series.com
